lyrics:
5 contributorsnewness lyricsverse 1

well im a virgo so my signs compatible
so we gone get along just fine i hope so

cause youre learning me and im learning you its cool
when love is all brand new
cause youre learning me and im learning you

what type of work you do or are you still in school

see musiq soulchild liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likechorus
